Package com.purnendu.quizo.databases

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
androidx.room.RoomDatabase
com.purnendu.quizo.databases.UserDatabase
public abstract class UserDatabase extends androidx.room.RoomDatabase
Abstract Room database class for managing user and quiz attempt data in the Quizo application. This database contains both User and Attempt entities.

Configuration:

  • entities: Specifies the User and Attempt classes as entities.
  • version: Sets the database version to 2.
  • exportSchema: Set to false as schema export is not required for this application.
This class provides an abstract method to access the UserDao.
Version:
2.0.1
Author:
Purnendu Guha
